abstract: United States men's basketball team is knocked out of Pan American Games semifinals, falling to Mexico, 71-55, before a raucous crowd in Guadalajara.
snippet: The United States was knocked out of the Pan American Games semifinals, falling to Mexico, 71-55, before a raucous crowd in Guadalajara.
lead_paragraph: The United States was knocked out of the Pan American Games semifinals, falling to Mexico, 71-55, before a raucous crowd in Guadalajara.
